content: Remove current_care_case override from LimitedPaperworkSession to fix security vulnerability
Add proper authorization to payment form modal
Fix race condition in payment method assignment using .last
Consolidate duplicate assignment components into single component
Fix component inheritance - use ApplicationComponent instead of ViewComponent::Base
Add proper error handling for assignment completion
Improve authorization logic to be more explicit
Add missing analytics parameters to direct redirects
Improve test coverage for session integration
